item.title: DZS INC 10-K
item.description: DZS INC, which is in the Telephone & Telegraph Apparatus [3661] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 09, 2022 had 27694 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 377 instances 2021 - 271 instances financial - 233 instances 31 - 220 instances december - 216 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
